import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./RegisterPage.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RegisterPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[confirmPassword,setConfirmPassword]=useState("");const[username,setUsername]=useState("");// 添加 username 字段
const navigate=useNavigate();const handleRegister=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(password!==confirmPassword){alert("Confirm your password！");return;}try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/user/register",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({username,email,password})});if(response.ok){alert("Register Success！");navigate("/login");}else{const errorData=await response.json();alert("Registration failed: "+(errorData.message||response.status));}}catch(error){console.error("Registration error:",error);alert("Something went wrong. Please try again later.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"register-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"register-form",onSubmit:handleRegister,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"register-title",children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"confirm password",value:confirmPassword,onChange:e=>setConfirmPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Already a Traveler\uFF1F",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Login"})]})]})});};export default RegisterPage;
